definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: Develop educational and training plans for team leaders and production operators.
sentences.chinese: 为班组长及生产一线员工制定教育培训计划。

sentences.english: The working tefeel will finish the job next week.
sentences.chinese: 任务班组将在下周干完这活。

sentences.english: The working team will finish the job next week.
sentences.chinese: 工作班组将鄙人周干完这活。

sentences.english: The safety in production is influenced by the high and low comprehensive quality of team and group leader.
sentences.chinese: 班组长综合素质的高低，可影响安全生产。

sentences.english: Thus, to study the performance of the work groups in state-owned enterprises is very important.
sentences.chinese: 于是，对于国企班组团队效能的研究就显得十分重要。

sentences.english: The company occupies more than 20 acres, for a number of team production.
sentences.chinese: 公司占地20余亩，可供多个班组生产作业。

sentences.english: The third is to establish long-term management mechanism, and promote team-building for protracted.
sentences.chinese: 三是要建立长效管理机制，推动班组建设持久开展。

sentences.english: Responsible for training workshop leader and team leader about Lean and management.
sentences.chinese: 负责车间主任和班组长的精益生产和管理知识的培训。

sentences.english: In accordance with team work content, establish team annual project plan.
sentences.chinese: 根据班组工作内容，制定班组年度项目计划。

sentences.english: In accordance with team work content, establish team annual project plan.
sentences.chinese: 根据班组工作内容，制定班组年度项目计划。

sentences.english: Project implementation and outcome is one of the important bases for the evaluation of team work.
sentences.chinese: 项目实施及成果是评价班组工作的重要依据之一。

sentences.english: A peripheral part of that crew’s duties was taking care of the company’s data communications systems.
sentences.chinese: 那个班组有一部分工作是负责公司的数据通信系统。

sentences.english: In the new era, work groups in state-owned enterprises are attached great importance by the government.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，国企班组在新时期甚受国家重视。

sentences.english: Lead shift production activities against quality standard and schedule.
sentences.chinese: 领导班组按质量标准和生产计划组织生产。

sentences.english: Assist other team staff to handle day-to-day repair work.
sentences.chinese: 协助其它班组员工处理日常报修工作。

sentences.english: The working teare will finish the job next week.
sentences.chinese: 职业班组将在下周干完这活。

definition: service (on a train, a plane etc)
a routine meeting of a squad/team or class
to inspect metal for flaws (using X-ray or ultrasound etc)
to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)
